Travel Info

Ufo Attack

Rent A Car

Full stack web project in a group of 3. Web page where users can find information about travel destinations and add & view reviews. I worked on frontend side and created homepage slider & map and search -page.

Unity game project with C# in a group of 3. 2D shooting game where player target is to destroy flying ufo. Ufo gets becomes stronger each time it gets destroyed. Player starts with weak weponry and with each destroyed ufo there is possibility to get stronger weapon. I worked on game logic side, creating logic for shooting, weapon drops etc.

Java desktop application in a group of 2. In a app user can simulate fitness center customer flow. Fitness center has 9 different service point and all of them have special attributes like treating time, capacity etc. User can follow progress of the simulation in a UI created with JavaFX and when the simulation is over user has option to save various statistics about the simulation in SQL database. I worked on motor of the simulator and creating database connections.

Java desktop application in a group of 5. Application where users can play single hand poker, chat with other players and view statistics about their game history & leaderboards. In a poker game user tries to get best possible hand with five cards. After the initial draw user has option to switch as many cards as he likes to. User earns credits based on bet size and the rarity of the final hand. All the user information, like credits and played games, are saved into SQL database after each game round. Development of the application was done within Scrum -type of project management. I worked on JavaFX of the poker game and poker game logic, like card switching and chaining poker logic to work with UI.

Full stack web project in a group of 2 using MERN stack. In a web page user can add car available for a rent or view & apply a rent of a car. I worked mainly on the backend of the project.
